title: Manager, Planning, Engagement & Innovation
biography: Ramata-Hélène Gagnon serves as Senior Officer, Planning, Engagement, and Innovation within the Space Science and Technology (SST) branch. In her role, she is responsible for helping planning and managing relationships with a wide range of stakeholders, both internal and external to the CSA, including industry, academia, and other government departments (OGDs). With a strong background in strategic and innovation planning, she is experienced in developing and renewing collaborative arrangements. Additionally, she supports the organization of various workshops in collaboration with CSA partners.
